SourceString: Deals <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage to a single target.\nConsumes <me_Flow>Flow</> to deal <b>{data.FlowDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.\nIf this skill consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> or the target is killed, its cooldown is refreshed.

Teleport to target before attack.
<b>{TravelDistance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> Range.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Tags: +Movement, +Teleport

Teleport to a single target and deal <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage.
<b>{data.TravelDistance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> Range.
Consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> to deal <b>{data.FlowDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.
If this skill consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> or the target is killed, its cooldown is refreshed.
Turns into a ranged single target spell.\nTags: +Shadow

Deal <b>{data.SpellDmg}|floor()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> to target enemy.\nConsumes <me_Flow>Flow</> to deal <b>{data.FlowDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.\nIf this skill consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> or the target is killed, its cooldown is refreshed.

Consumes <me_Doom>Doom</> on target to deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Damage per <me_Doom>Doom</> consumed.\nOn kill applies <b>{Doom}|floor()</> <me_Doom>Doom</> to enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.

Consumes <me_Doom>Doom</> on target to deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Damage per <me_Doom>Doom</> consumed.\nOn kill applies <b>{Doom}|floor()</> <me_Doom>Doom</> to enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Does not consume <me_Flow>Flow</> for a bonus effect anymore.\nIf you kill a marked enemy with this attack, gain <me_Flow>Flow</>.
Does not consume <me_Flow>Flow</> for a bonus effect anymore.\nIf you kill a marked enemy with this attack, gain <me_Flow>Flow</>.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Damage against your <me_Mark>Mark</>.\nWhen this ability hits your <me_Mark>Mark</> it recovers <b>{CDRefresh_UI}%</> of its Cooldown.

On hit deals <b>{BaseDmg}|floor()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> + <b>{BonusDmg}|floor()</> per <me_Plague>Plagued</> stack on target in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
On hit deals <b>{BaseDmg}|floor()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> + <b>{BonusDmg}|floor()</> per <me_Plague>Plagued</> stack on target in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.

Throws a hidden blade dealing<b> {data.MinDmg}|floor() - {data.MaxDmg}|floor()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.\r\nInfinite <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.\r\n<b>{data.ProjRange_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> Projectile Range.

<b>+{CritMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> added Base <me_Critical>Critical Hit</> Chance.\nOn <me_Critical>Critical Hit</>, you have a <b>{RuptureChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance to cause <me_Rupture>Rupture</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
On <me_Critical>Critical Hit</>, you have a <b>{RuptureChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance to cause <me_Rupture>Rupture</>.

On hit apply a debuff for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> (non-stacking) with a <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|floor()%</> <me_Bleed>Bleed</> Chance every second.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
On hit apply a debuff for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> (non-stacking) with a <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|floor()%</> <me_Bleed>Bleed</> Chance every second.
Consumes <me_Doom>Doom</> on target to deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Damage to it per <me_Doom>Doom</> consumed.
Turns into a spell and fires a Shadow Dagger dealing <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.\nTags: +Shadow, +Spell, -Ranged Attack

Fires a Shadow Dagger dealing <b>{data.MinDmg}|floor() - {data.MaxDmg}|floor()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.\r\nInfinite <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.\r\n<b>{data.ProjRange_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> Projectile Range.
Instead fires your Weapon Projectile dealing <b>{DmgMod_UI}%</> Weapon Damage.\n<b>{ProjSpdMod_UI}|floor()%</> more Projectile Speed.\nRequires spear, dagger or ranged weapon

<me_FireDam>Fire</> your weapon dealing <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|floor()%</> Weapon Damage.
<b>{data.ProjSpeedFactor_UI}|floor()%</> more Projectile Speed.
Infinite <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.
Requires spear, dagger or ranged weapon

Emit an <me_Aura>Aura</> with a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{data.PoisonDmgIncrease_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{data.PhysicalDmgIncrease_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_Physical>Physical Damage</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>{AilmentChanceMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{AilmentPowerMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_AilmentPower>Ailment Power</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>{AilmentChanceMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{AilmentPowerMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_AilmentPower>Ailment Power</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>{CritChanceMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_Critical>Critical Hit</> Chance.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{CritDamageMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_CritDamMult>Critical Damage Multiplier</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>{CritChanceMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_Critical>Critical Hit</> Chance.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{CritDamageMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased <me_CritDamMult>Critical Damage Multiplier</>

Whenever you crit with an active ability, there is a <b>{Chance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance a Shadow Dagger backstabs the enemy dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

Whenever you crit with an active ability, there is a <b>{Chance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance a Shadow Dagger backstabs the enemy dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.
Grants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.
<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

Incompatible with Envenom
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.
Grants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.
<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

Incompatible with Blade Honing
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> Weapon <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.

Grants you <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison</> Weapon Damage.\nWhenever you hit an enemy with Weapon Attacks you have a secondary <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance to apply <me_Plague>Plagued</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

Grants you <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison</> Weapon Damage.\nWhenever you hit an enemy with Weapon Attacks you have a secondary <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance to apply <me_Plague>Plagued</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ResMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|round()%</> Maximum <me_PoisonDam>Poison</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ResMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|round()%</> Maximum <me_PoisonDam>Poison</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>{MSMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased Movement Speed, <b>+{ResMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_Impairment>Impairment</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> Maximum <me_Impairment>Impairment</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>{MSMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased Movement Speed, <b>+{ResMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_Impairment>Impairment</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> Maximum <me_Impairment>Impairment</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.

<me_Mark>Mark</> your target.\nWhen you hit the marked enemy, you deal an extra <b>{data.DmgPerc_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> of the hit as <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</>. This Damage cannot critically hit.\nThis effect ends, when the target is no longer your <me_Mark>Mark</>.
The marked target deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> reduced Damage.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
The marked target deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> reduced Damage.

After you have dealt a total of <b>{DmgCap}|round()</> Damage to the debuffed enemy, Mark for Death is consumed dealing <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> of that as <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.
Poison Burst now deals Damage in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius. Poison Burst also triggers when the target dies.
Poison Burst now deals Damage in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius. Poison Burst also triggers when the target dies.
When you critically hit the marked enemy with an active ability, they are hit by a Shadow Dagger dealing <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.
When directly used consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> to hit the target with <b>{Amount}|round()</> Shadow Daggers dealing <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> each.
Throw a grenade.\nDeals <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius at target location.
<b>100%</> of explosion Damage and Burning Ground Damage converted to <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.

Leaves behind burning ground at target location for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> that deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>{Interval}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\nNo <me_Exhaust>Exhaust</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.

Leaves behind burning ground at target location for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> that deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> every <b>{Interval}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Instead fires the explosive as a Ranged Weapon Attack. The Projectile deals <b>{WeaponDmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> Weapon Damage on hit and explodes.\nRequires Bow

On explosion sends <b>{ProjectileMin}|round()</> to <b>{ProjectileMax}|round()</> metal fragments in all directions dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> each with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>. \nAdditional hits against the same enemy have <b>90%</> less Damage and <b>90%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.

On explosion sends <b>{ProjectileMin}|round()</> to <b>{ProjectileMax}|round()</> metal fragments in all directions dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> each with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>. \nConsecutive hits have <b>90%</> less Damage and <b>90%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Fragmentation hits have <b>{RuptureChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_Rupture>Rupture</> Chance.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
Consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> to launch <b>+{ProjAmountMod}|round()</> Projectiles in a cone.
Consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> to launch <b>+{ProjAmountMod}|round()</> Projectiles in a cone.

Additional Projectiles instead cause cluster explosions. Cluster explosions deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> less Damage and have <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{ProjMod}|round()</> additional Projectiles.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.

Additional Projectiles instead cause cluster explosions. Cluster explosions deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> less Damage and have <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{ProjMod}|round()</> additional Projectiles.
Gain <b>{data.MSBonus_UI}|round()%</> increased Movement Speed, <b>{data.DmgBonus_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage for <b>{data.Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.

On use <me_Stun>Stuns</> enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius for <b>{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.\nTags: +<me_Disruption>Disruption</>
On use <me_Stun>Stuns</> enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius for <b>{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
On use gain <me_Flow>Flow</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Apply <b>{Doom}|round()</> <me_Doom>Doom</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Grants <b>{CritChanceMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Critical Chance.\nGrants <b>+{CritDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_Critical>Critical Hit</> <me_CritDamMult>Damage Multiplier</>.
Grants additional <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage.\n<b>{BaseCDMod_UI}|round()%</> less Cooldown Duration.\n<b>{DurationMod_UI}|round()%</> less Duration.

Grants <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality</> Weapon Damage.\nGrants <b>{LifestealMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_Lifesteal>Lifesteal</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.

Grants <b>{ActionSpdMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Attack and Cast Speed.\nWhen directly used, gain an additional <b>{MSMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Movement Speed that decays over <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Dash <b>{data.TravelDistance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> in target direction dealing <b>{data.MinDmg}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> to enemies you pass through.
When you hit your <me_Mark>Mark</>, gain <me_Flow>Flow</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.

Deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> Weapon damage instead.
<b>{DistanceMod_UI}|round()%</> less Travel Distance.
<b>{BaseCDMod_UI}|round()%</> less Cooldown Duration.
Requires Melee Weapon
Dash <b>{data.TravelDistance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> in target direction dealing <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage.\nRequires Melee Weapon
When this ability hits your <me_Mark>Mark</>, it recovers <b>{CDRedMod_UI}|round()%</> Cooldown.
Deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage against <me_Channel>Channeling</> or Incapacitated enemies.
Applies <b>{Doom}|round()</> <me_Doom>Doom</> to enemies you pass in a <b>{Width_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> wide area.
Deals <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you.\nRequires One Handed Axe, Dagger or Sword.
When you take a <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Hit, your next use of Bladespin within <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> deals <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.

On ability start gain <b>+{GlanceChanceMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Chance and <b>+{GlanceMitigationMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Damage Reduction for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Turns into a Spell dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> instead.\nNo Weapon requirements.\nTags: +Shadow, -Melee Attack, +Spell
Deals <b>{data.PoisonDmg}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you.
On hit consumes <me_Doom>Doom</> to deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Doom>Doom</> consumed.
Deal <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</> to your <me_Mark>Mark</> per <me_Doom>Doom</> consumed from all hit enemies.
Deal <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</> to your <me_Mark>Mark</> per <me_Doom>Doom</> consumed from all hit enemies.

Hits twice.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
Requires Melee dual wielding.
Consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> for <b>+{LifestealMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> added Base <me_Lifesteal>Lifesteal</> and <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.

<me_FireDam>Fire</> <b>{data.ProjAmount}|round()</> Projectiles in a cone dealing <b>{IsSpell}|plural(other={data.WeaponDmg_UI}, one={data.PoisonDmg}){IsSpell}|plural(other=%)</> {IsSpell}|plural(other=Weapon Damage, one = <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>).
Infinite <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.
Projectiles deal <b>{data.SecondHitDmgMultiplier_UI}|round()%</> less Damage after their first hit.
Additional hits against the same enemy deal <b>{data.ConsecutiveDmgMultiplier_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and have <b>{data.ConsecutiveAilmentMultiplier_UI}|round()%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Requires Ranged Weapon.

Instead fling hidden blades in all directions dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.
<b>+{ProjAmountMod}|round()</> additional Projectiles.
<b>{MoreProjMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectiles.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
No Weapon Requirement

<me_FireDam>Fire</> <b>{data.ProjAmount}|round()</> Projectiles in all directions dealing <b>{IsSpell}|plural(other={data.PierceDmg}, one={data.PoisonDmg})</> {IsSpell}|plural(other=<me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>, one = <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>).
Infinite <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.
Projectiles deal <b>{data.SecondHitDmgMultiplier_UI}|round()%</> less Damage after their first hit.
Additional hits against the same enemy deal <b>{data.ConsecutiveDmgMultiplier_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and have <b>{data.ConsecutiveAilmentMultiplier_UI}|round()%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Projectiles get stuck where they land and return to you after <b>{Delay}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> dealing <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage.
Consumes <me_Flow>Flow</> for <b>{MoreProjMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectiles and <me_Stun>Stuns</> for <b>{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
On hit <b>{DoomChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to apply <b>{Doom}|round()</> <me_Doom>Doom</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy cost.
Turns into a spell dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> instead.\nTags: +Shadow, -Ranged Attack, +Spell
